about_the_game:
After vanishing from his hometown and being spotted in a different one, a creative yet confused 14-year-old named Chaos finds himself in a world that seems determined to destroy him. As he embarks on a journey to uncover the truth behind a series of mysterious disappearances on Kathario, Chaos begins to wonder if his own vanishing is somehow connected. Filled with mystery, joy, grief, love, and horror, this adventure forces him to confront the dark truths lurking around him.

  • Bullet Hell and Turn-Based Combat: Experience a blend of action-packed mechanics and strategic gameplay.

  • A Powerful Narrative: Immerse yourself in a story that’s gripping, emotional, and unforgettable.

  • Handcrafted Pixel Art: Stunning visuals created with love and care to bring the world to life.

  • A Wide Variety of Choices: Every decision, big or small, shapes your journey.

  • Multiple Endings: Replayability at its finest—discover how your path could have unfolded.

  • A Wide Variety of Peculiar Faces to Meet: Encounter quirky, unforgettable characters with stories of their own.

  • Secrets and Stories to Uncover: Dive into hidden layers of the world waiting to be revealed.

  • A Hilarious Sense of Humor and Deep Metanarrative: Clever writing that will make you laugh, think, and feel.

  • A Beautiful Blend of Horror and Humor: Feel the tension and the relief in perfect balance.

  • A Unique Original Soundtrack: Music that enhances every moment of your adventure.

  • A Lovable Cast of Characters: Build connections and empathize with those you meet along the way.

  • Occasional Voice Acting: Bringing key moments and characters to life with captivating performances.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains descriptions and depictions of suicide and self harm, Murder and descriptions and depictions of Domestic Violence.
There is also depictions of alcoholism and drug usage and heavy themes of religions such as a extremely warped depiction of Christianity and Satanism.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Anything

short_description: Somewhere in the 90s on an island named Kathario, a place where recently some strange sightings have been taking place... It's Chaos's job to find out who what and why this is happening.
